record.id: field.name="points" and file.name="pcsoftware" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: points
record.file.name: pcsoftware

brief.brief: The number of points a software installation consumes.

detail.detail: For example, an office software license credits you 1,000 rights. Each software installation consumes 10 points. The software installation counter enables you to verify that the software has not been installed more than 100 times.
The value of this field determines what happens when installations for a single software item are associated with the same workstation or the same user.
